name: Kevin Gillam
text:
Indriani and the team at Land Rover Gulf Coast were awesome to work with every step of the way.  This was my first Land Rover purchase, and the service, knowledge, professionalism, and patience Indriani displayed was top notch.

Due to very high demand, and supply issues due to COVID, I ordered my vehicle in January 2021 and received it in late May. Indriani was always available to answer my questions and super responsive to any concerns.  The purchase was a great experience and I would not hesitate to recommend this dealership to anyone looking to buy a Jaguar or Land Rover vehicle.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Jerry Collins
text:
The entire experience at Jaguar-Land Rover Gulf Coast was excellent. Everyone, with whom we dealt, treated us courteously and professionally.

In particular, our Sales Coordinator Sherry Hall, was extremely knowledgeable and helpful. She has an easy-going style, which was evidenced by her obvious desire to help us whether we purchased or not. It was refreshing to deal with someone who was not just out sell a car. She bargained for us with management and ultimately negotiated what we consider an excellent deal. Thank you!

This is our second vehicle purchased at Jaguar-Land Rover Gulf Coast. It certainly will not be our last.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Sandra Howard
text: Phenomenal, easy and actually enjoyable car buying experience!! Hands down the best I’ve dealt with... From the email communication with Stephanie before I arrived at the dealership to the super chill and awesome salesman Ben and the amazing finance guy Brad, Not one time did I feel pressured, uncomfortable or stressed out. I highly recommend checking out this dealership next time you’re in the market for a new ride. If they don’t have what you’re looking for, they will point you to someone that does. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ All the way!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Lee Johnson
text: We had an excellent experience purchasing our Range Rover Velar. Ben Payne was awesome to work with and answered all of my questions even after I took my Velar home. We are happy with our experience. Please see Ben if shopping for a new vehicle.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: zeke woollett
text:
I found Land Rover Gulf Coast while looking nationwide for a particular Jaguar I-Pace. The entire team was simply fabulous, from my initial contact with Stephanie Pate, to David Menaker handling the financing and paperwork. Sherry Hall, my salesperson, has been with me through every step of the process and has been absolutely fabulous! I really appreciate the personal touch that she has brought to the transaction - I'm almost starting to feel like family!
I actually walked onto another lot her in California two months ago to buy a car, but was so angry and disgusted by the sleezy sales tactics that I vowed to never work with another dealer again. Sherry, David and Stephanie have convinced me that there are still good people in the business - thanks to you all!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Philp Muller
text:
2021 Land Rover Defender 110
vehicle in stock & ready to go.  have to wait for options.  paperwork went smoothly.  tried using on-line credit app but it didn't work. staff took care of it.  very pleased overall..

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Alan Rae
text:
Had an exceptional experience at Gulf Coast Land Rover service this weekend. Driving from SC to New Orleans we broke down late Friday afternoon near this dealer in Mobile, AL. After the car was towed there by AAA they diagnosed the issue (jammed fuel injector) in <15 mins. As they were about to close, they provided a loaner vehicle so we could drive on to New Orleans and attend a wedding. Parts were a challenge to source over the weekend, so we were given the loaner until Tuesday, allowing us flexibility while the car was awaiting repair. Tuesday am they promptly performed the repair, replacing 3 injectors, all spark plugs & an oil change due to unburnt fuel in the sump. The car was returned to us just after lunchtime, allowing us to make the 7+ hour drive back to SC the same today.
Shout out to Kevin Busby (service advisor) for looking after us throughout and the technician. 5 star customer service.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Sherry Young
text:
I have the hardest time buying a car!!! Land Rover Gulf Coast made my experience a lot less stressed. I thought I knew what I wanted before arriving at the dealership. After test driving the one I made the trip from Bainbridge Ga. for...another car caught my eye. Needless to say I was torn between the two. Ben Payne was very knowledgeable and helpful... he ran out in the rain several times to bring the cars back and  forth for me to either look at or drive. It took me a few hours but I’m very happy with my decision.
Thank you Ben for your patience.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Emily Ng (Emily)
text: My husband and I had been searching for a particular car for months. We finally saw it online at Land Rover Gulf Coast and took the 7-hour drive from Houston to Mobile. By the time we got there, the banks were closed so we could not get financing. Our sales rep, Indriani, and her manager, Brad, said they would hold the car for us till our financing was approved. A couple days later, we finally got the funds, made the 7-hour trek back to Mobile and purchased our car. Indriani and Brad were extremely communicative the entire process while we were waiting on funding and were so gracious and patient. They answered any and all questions we had. I would definitely make another 7-hour drive just to purchase from this dealership again! These guys are the best!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: ryan rodriguez
text: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! For a pristine car company I expected pristine customer service was told they wouldn’t touch my car do to the year and brand but where else would you get work done for a Jaguar I assumed a Jaguar dealership they said no do to the age of the vehicle so he referred me to another shop when I tried to write the name of the shop down and asked him for it again he hung up in my face then he never gave me his name I suggest if you need work done on your vehicle take it to Florida or Mississippi cause this Jaguar dealership doesn’t put there customers first I wish I could give them negative stars but that isn’t an option.

resp.text:
Ryan,

I am very sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. This is not the customer service or experience we want any of our customers to have. Our General Manager would like to speak to you about your recent phone call. At your earliest convenience please call 251-544-7318. With your feedback, we can only improve our process and customer experience.

Haley H.
Marketing Specialist

name: Chad Coffman
text: We recently purchased a 2020 Land Rover Velar from Land Rover Gulf Coast. The experience was amazing and it was because of the salesman Levi Worley. He was understanding of our requirements that we were looking for in a vehicle. He was so responsive through email, text, phone, FaceTime and a virtual showroom, that we purchased the vehicle without even having to go to the dealership. The vehicle was delivered and all the paperwork was signed via a currier service. The entire process was extremely painless and it was such an awesome experience with Levi so we are already looking at a second vehicle purchase. We have previously our vehicles serviced there and their service manger and technicians are extremely known too. Dean (service manager) is one of the best in the industry. BTW, I live in Enterprise, AL so you know I have a ton of vehicle buying options between here and Mobile but I consciously choose Land Rover Gulf Coast. Thanks again Levi, Dean, Brad, and David. We are looking forward to the next purchase.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: jason darley
text: I worked with Ben Payne, who was referred to me through a friend. My wife and I originally looked for a vehicle in April, then I returned and ordered an SUV in early June. It arrived earlier than expected, in late October. Ben was very accessible and always quick to get an answer when I needed one. The entire process-beginning to end-was very easy and stress free due to Ben's help and he has continued to assist after the purchase. The vehicle is the most comfortable I've ever driven and my next purchase will be through Ben, as well. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Beam
text: I bought A new RR SPORT in late April and have experienced a couple of issues with the radio that concern me, but have called several times and left messages and the salesman received my texts and to this day I have not received a call back...when I was in the process of purchasing the vehicle...I had no problems with call backs...not sure what is going on, but I’m not happy.

resp.text:
Dr. Beamon, I am very sorry to hear that your Range Rover radio has been concerning you and that you have not been able to reach one of our staff members to discuss your concerns. I have made the General Manager and Sales Manager aware of the situation. You should be receiving a phone call very soon from one of them. If you do not receive a call, please feel free to reach me on my personal line and I will make sure we get you in touch with someone.

Thank you,

Haley H.
Marketing Specialist
251.301.0880

name: Daniel Huggins
text: This by far was the greatest experiences I've had purchasing a vehicle. From my salesman Ben Payne to the Finance (Brad, and Ryan)  team everything was top notch. I'm one who's big on HONESTY and INTEGRITY, and during the whole process these characteristics, definitely was displayed from the Land Rover Gulf Coast staff. I truly thank Ben for his patients, generosity, and most of all being a man of great CHARACTER. He and his team made my decision of purchasing a car lot easier. So, if you're in the market to purchase a new car, please go to Land Rover Gulf Coast and do me a favor ask for "Ben" and tell him Daniel sent you. I truly hope this review inspires and reaches whomever is reading this. We all know purchasing a car and a home are two of the biggest decision we POTENTIALLY will make in life,  (WELL beside proposing  LOL ;-) ) but the guys here will give you peace of mind in making that "BIG DECISION". THANKS AGAIN I APPRECIATE YOU ALL!!

name: Barbara Nelson
text: David Baker is an awesome salesman.  I told him what i wanted and he found it for me within a few days.   Very easy to work with and super professional.   I highly recommend DAVID for your next vehicle purchase.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Luke West
text: I purchased a vehicle that I found online and from my first call I was impressed with the prompt service given to me. Levi and the team at Land Rover Gulf Coast had the car ready for me when I arrived and the closing took less than 30 minutes. Stellar service, extremely professional and kind team, and a great experience.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Dakota Coffman
text: Just recently purchased a 2017 Cadillac XT5 from Land Rover Gulf Coast. Thank you to Levi Worley and Brad Lefferts for making the process painless. Purchasing the vehicle was smooth from start to finish and I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. I would recommend Land Rover Gulf Coast to anyone looking to purchase a vehicle. Again, Levi & Brad were the reasons this went so smooth, especially during these COVID times. Hats off to them!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Kevin Frazier
text: Ben was awesome!!! I am loving my new Jaguar.  Ben made the buying process simple and fast.  I made up my mind, called him on his cell and told him I was on my way and he had my papers waiting on me, sent the car to be cleaned up and fueled.  I was there maybe a total of 20 min, and he had me ready to go.  Thanks so much to everyone that helped me!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

text: Excellent service, quality car buying experience from knowledgeable, friendly staff.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Fred Moore
text: David Baker was great to deal with.  Found the exact vehicle I wanted at another dealership and had it shipped to him.  Process was easy on finalizing deal.  Always kept me informed through text message.  Highly recommend asking for David.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Kevin Frazier
text: Ben was awesome!!! I am loving my new Jaguar.  Ben made the buying process simple and fast. I was there maybe a total of 20 min, and he had me ready to go.  Thanks so much to everyone that helped me!!!!

name: Joel Williams
text:
I would like to thank David Baker for my third purchase..David sold me three 2020 Land Rovers and had them delivered to me in Destin...
When I received my black Land Rover I noticed a small scratch on the hood. I called David and he immediately had the car picked up the next day and taken back to Mobile..The scratch way repaired and the car was returned to me within two days..Great Job..
"My Wife and Daughter are enjoying their new  Land Rovers"

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Luke Miller
text: This was my first dealership bought car, and I was very pleased with everyone there. David, Brad, everyone was nice and friendly. And the main reason is because I just love my car(honda fit) and was glad to purchase it at land rover gulf coast.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Lewis Wendland
text: Just bought a 2015 Ford mustang gt worked with two gentleman named Ben P. and David M. they were both extremely helpful and friendly with the whole experience from start to finish.

name: Landon Zabcik
text: Made our trade-in and purchase a breeze!  No games or gimmicks.  They gave me a straight-up price and followed through.  Would definitely recommend them.  Our sales person Ben was great to work with and very helpful.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience with Ben! We take pride in serving our customers and hope you'll let us know if we can be of service in the future. Thank you for choosing Land Rover Gulf Coast - a Joe Bullard Company!

name: Eleanor Werden
text: My husband Al and I were so impressed by David Baker and his whole Team at Land Rover Gulf Coast..they felt like family from the moment we walked in the door. We have never had quite the car buying  experience as we had with David, he made purchasing our first ever Land Rover feel like the right thing to do! Thanks, David!!! Al and Linda Ward

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Zollie Bryant
text: Levi proved to be the correct salesman for me. He introduced me to the experience of becoming a Jaguar owner. He answered every question I asked and showed me cars that interested me. After discussing my  preferences he helped to pick the car that felt would be right for me!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Alicia B
text: I Had David baker as my seller he was very nice and so was his assistant it was very fast to see the car and test drive it before i took it home they where very friendly and helpful with my kids also. I recommend getting a car from him or anyone in this dealership. I got my car that day ♡♡ i had got the 2016 discovery sport ♡♡

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: marmcdow3
text: My parents had a wonderful experience purchasing their car.  Brad was so efficient with the paperwork that my parents were out the door in fewer than 30 minutes. Ben’s tutorial made my parents feel completely at ease operating their new car. The staff is sincerely welcoming, not pushy, and, they are extremely professional.  I look forward to purchasing another vehicle from them.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. We're happy to hear that Brad and our team made your parent's experience a great one. Thank you for choosing Land Rover Gulf Coast and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Michael Chang
text: Fantastic buying experience.  Initial call was returned promptly on a weekend.  We made an appointment to come look at cars, and every single person we came across was friendly and respectful.  Totally customer-centered.  We a]had initially planned on looking at other brands, but decided to go with Land Rover in large part due to the service.

name: Steve Curvino
text:
This was my first car purchase in 9 years.  I had a fantastic experience with the team at Jaguar Gulf Coast, LLC and I never set foot on the lot - I live out of state, so everything was done via email and phone calls.  Ty Bullard, David Baker and Joseph Chambers have gone out of their way to ensure that the buying experience has been enjoyable.  They listened to my wants/needs and found the 2020 Jaguar F-Pace S that met my criteria - they had to obtain the car from another dealer.  Follow up after delivering me the car has been great - they truly want to ensure that I enjoy this awesome vehicle (and understand all the bells and whistles).
I highly recommend this dealership and look forward to doing business with it (and the guys listed above) in the future

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Dean Waite
text: These guys just do it right.  No other way to say it.  Fantastic experience from start to finish.  Our 2nd Range Rover purchase from Land Rover of the Gulf Coast and hopefully not our last.  David Baker is as good of a “salesman” as I’ve dealt with.  I put “salesman” in quotes because that’s the last thing you’re thinking about when dealing with David.  No pressure, no sleazy car salesman BS.  You feel like you’re dealing with a friend.   Highly recommend David Baker and this dealership.

name: Susan Richards
text: Great dealership! Levi Worley was extremely helpful throughout our buying experience and very knowledgable. I just love my new E-Pace! Thank you, Levi!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Lee and April Whitaker
text:
The service here is amazing.  Our family was coming home from vacation from Florida to Texas and our coolant and DEF notification came on.  We called the dealership to get an appointment to get topped off.  When we got there they serviced our car immediately and had us on the road in minutes.

Thank you Dean for wonderful service!!

name: Michael Brown
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff.  We had a great experience and bought a great car at the right price.

name: Meredith Russell
text: David Baker is simply awesome!!! The ENTIRE team made what began as a SUPER frustrating experience at another dealer to a super fun and easy experience. I LOVE my new Discovery Sport!!! And they have done everything they promised and more. I strongly urge you to give the folks at Land Rover Gulf Coast a chance.  David is super knowledgeable and even climbed in the third row so I could make sure it had enough room to give me peace of mind. Thanks again!!

name: Cathy Labrum
text: David Baker was great to work with.  No hassle selling.  He was very nice and answered all of my questions.   I would surely recommend Land Rover Gulf Coast.  Thank you David.  Great job!

name: Michael Meshad
text: Great dealership. My buying experience could not have been any better. David Baker and the entire Jaguar team were very professional, helpful, and made the process much easier than I expected. their help and service continues even though the purchase is completed.

name: joe clark
text: Excellent people and also easy transaction !! Levi definitely made my Jaguar buying experience super smooth and easy. Brad also !!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Amy Conway
text: Micayla was friendly and knowledgeable about the vehicle.  She made sure I was comfortable through the whole process.  Ryan in Finance was also friendly & efficient.  While he made sure I was aware of all of my options, he did not make me feel pressured and was respectful of my budget.  This was the quickest process from start to finish compared to other times I have purchased cars.

name: Theresa Reid
text: A totally great experience buying a vehicle!! If you want to deal with someone that cares and wants you to get the perfect fit go see David Menaker!!! He loves what he does and helping people is top priority.  Everyone at Land Rover is professional and friendly.

name: Molly OBryant
text: Great experience dealing with David Baker. He was very professional yet down to earth and easy to work with. Not pushy at all. He found me the exact car I needed and wanted. Will definitely be back in the future for my next car.

name: Wesley Traver
text: Outstanding!  David was very knowledgeable. Everyone was involved in making this the easiest and most pleasurable car buying experience that I've  had.  The service didn't end with the sale.  We finished at rush hour.  David gave us directions for an alternate route to avoid the traffic and even called us on the way home to make sure we missed it.   Easily the best customer service I've had anywhere.  Got a great car out of the deal too. Thanks.

name: maria arnett
text: We have purchased two Land Rovers from this dealership and the service has been outstanding from sales to the service department. This week the service department picked up our vehicle from our home in Gulf Breeze, Florida for a regular scheduled maintenance and everyone could not have been more accommodating. The delivery driver, Robert, was polite and punctual and the ladies handling the scheduling process were in constant  contact with us keeping us abreast of what was being done to our  Discovery.  Great Team!

name: Laken Jones
text: Brandon was a great salesman to work with! I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for a new or used car.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Pashia Groom
text: David Baker and David Menaker were fantastic. We moved from 15 years with Mercedes because of the service and professionalism! All of the higher end products are amazing but customer care is the deciding factor! Great work Joe Bullard!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Lauren McClellan
text: Very nice facility. Levi was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable. We had a wonderful buying experience.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Lamar Conerly
text: I have been a customer of Jaguar of Mobile for years and am now on my second car. They worked on my first car before and after the warranty expired and did a good job. This is my second F-Type. If you want one or any other Jaguar, give David Baker a call. He literally looked all over the country for my specific car.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: REHLEIN OPERATIONAL
text:
My name is Luis L.... I'm a very satisfied customer. Great place for your next car. Respectful, friendly and especially honest treatment from the point you enter the door. Highly recommended. If your intrested in quality cars, talk to David Baker... he's simply the best of the best!!!!

Respectfully and honestly, Luis. 5 stars to David Baker *****

name: Kirbi Johnson
text:
Awesome overall purchasing experience for us!
Ben & David were both friendly & very professional throughout the process.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Steven ******
text:
Shopping for a new Jaguar was a perfect experience. Ben Payne helped me find the most beautiful XE Limited edition. He was extremely knowledgeable   and did not pressure the sale... of course the car sales itself! What a beautiful car!... and David helped with the contract and financial end and really knows his job...Buying or having your car serviced at Jaguar is a great experience... starbucks coffee and an array of drinks to select... They treat you so well!... Ben worked so hard to get me in this car which is a dream come true.... I was devastated by the loss of my XF but so happy to have found this XE model at the right time. A jaguar is an investment, but they are so safe, well designed and have a certain status that only a Jaguar owner can understand... and they make you feel like you are family at Joe Bullard Jaguar in Mobile Alabama.
One final big thanks to Ben Payne for making this happen and making sure I am happy with my new baby, The Jaguar XE portfolio limited edition.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Thomas Briand
text: Best automotive buying experience I’ve had in a long time. Indriani and Brad were very helpful and made this a pleasant experience. I will be back in the future.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Christina Rhodes
text: The best car buying experience that I have ever had in my long history of vehicle purchases.  I am looking forward to the next one.  Ben Payne and David Menaker are true professionals at what they do.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Scott Cole
text: Excellent customer service and a great deal on our new Land Rover...Levi, Brad, and David were a great team and easy to work with!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Keith Smith
text: Great Experience, Michaelle was more then amazing helping me with my purchase!

name: Michael Deal
text: Great sales team.  Wonderful experience.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Joseph Ruffo
text: Out of state Land Rover owner. Unfortunately had a flat tire and gulf coast was the closest and was still an hour away. Would not recommend this dealer based solely on the quality of service I received while trying to schedule an appointment. The receptionist was extremely rude and acted as if she was doing me a favor by scheduling me for a time I stated was unavailable. Their loaners were "booked out" for weeks and they had no alternatives. Receptionist seemed extremely pretentious -- probably biased but I am a customer and could have done without the attitude after spending a small fortune on a dumb car.

resp.text:
Hi Joseph,

I’m so sorry for the experience you had when trying to work with our dealership in your time of need. Our General Manager would like to speak with you personally to get more details on your experience; however, I cannot find the contact information for you in our system.

Please feel free to call him directly on Monday at the dealership (251-478-2228) or if more convenient, you can email your contact number to info@joebullard.com and he’ll be happy to call you.

Sincerely,
Kristina M.
Marketing & PR Manager

name: Jeff Henry
text: I have been looking for a pre-owned pick up truck that was in great shape with low mileage for a really long time. It was always next to impossible to find a good price until I found my Ram 1500 Laramie at Land Rover Gulf Coast. The team there from internet sales to the salesman  Ben and the rest of the team are very friendly and they keep it real. No mumbo jumbo. Great place to do business

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Katie Everitt
text: Ben Payne was awesome to work with! He took great care of us and we are very satisfied with our purchase!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Jason Edwards
text: David Baker is perhaps the most attentive car salesman I've ever encountered.  Not only did he give me the time of day when others wouldn't, but he also went above and beyond what was expected to make sure I was happy with what I was purchasing.  If they don't have it on the lot, David can and will find you what you want.  Believe me, I know.  This is the third vehicle David has found for me and they all have exceeded my expectations.  The whole process was quick and professional.  I would recommend the Land Rover Gulf Coast team for any vehicle that you are thinking about purchasing.

name: Fran Jefferson
text: Went above and beyond when we could not find the dealership, we are from Ms. and not at all familiar with the Mobile area. Great people, very professional and really seem to car about your satisfaction.

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Albert Williams
text: This was a great experience to purchase my New Jaguar XE Premium. I encourage you to visit this dealership for your next auto purchase. Ask for Product Specialist Ben Payne...outstanding representative for this dealership.

name: Girlfromoutoftown Emily
text: I bought my Mercedes here and the staff went over and above to help me with my trade and get in the car. Friendly people and fun atmosphere. Thank you guys!

resp.text: Hi Emily, Thank you for this great review. We strive to give the best experience for all of our clients. We're so glad you enjoyed your car purchase and we hope you'll keep in touch!

name: Bill Dodd
text:
Excellent dealership.   I've found cars on CarGurus a few times over the last 5 years that have landed me in the Joe Bullard Land Rover and Jaguar dealership.  Each time, the staff has been super-friendly and extremely helpful.

This time, Indriani Davenport started my file and Levi Worley & David Menaker closed my deal.   They showed me flexibility in scheduling and valued my time.  They appraised two trades for me in less time than CarMa and the trade allowance was right on with my expectations.

I bought a lightly used 1-owner SUV.  The SUV was priced fairly.  Their detail folks did a good job with it, using the appropriate leather conditioners and good wax products so that my new truck was clean and not overly caked in unnecessary auto products.

I'll be back for my next car purchase.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Sandra Vaughn
text:
Ben Payne was the agent who we worked with at Joe Bullard.  He was courteous and very knowledgeable with all the inventory and afforded
every request with a friendly and kind response. We highly recommend Joe Bullard Automobile Dealership and be sure to ask for  Ben Payne for the best buying experience.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Patrick Ellison
text: Ben was AWESOME!!  I drove round trip 5 hours to get my car!! I was by myself and  Ben even set up my car to be dropped off at my work!! If you are looking for a great new or used car call Ben!!

name: Michael Babston
text: This was my first purchase at Joe Bullard Land Rover, and it was a fantastic experience. I cannot speak highly enough about the salespeople at the dealership. In particular, Indriani went above and beyond, and was extremely attentive and helpful. Overall, it has been a great experience!

name: Karen Fisher
text: I have leased and purchased vehicles from this dealership for 20 years!  Everyone is so delightful to work with!  Very responsive and always go the extra mile!  I cannot say enough good things about my experiences!

resp.text: We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience. We take pride in serving our customers and hope to see you again soon!

name: Rich
text: I can't speak for sales, but the service department is either overwhelmed with vehicles, under staffed, both or something else. When you're told you can drop off a vehicle to have a check engine light looked at, but it'll take three or four weeks to get to, there's a problem. I can only imagine the denial  by LR/Jag if my engine blows up, before "my appointment."

resp.text:
Hi Mr. Jones,

I'm very sorry for the inconvenience of delayed scheduling for your recent service request. I have forwarded your feedback and contact information to our Service Manager and The BDC Manager to see if they can look into this further for me. Please be expecting a call from either Mrs. Laney Floyd or Mr. Lonnie Bourgeois to discuss further and see how we may help.

In the meantime thank you for providing us this valuable feedback. We appreciate that you've chosen Jaguar Land Rover Gulf Coast and I'm confident our team will do anything in our power to make sure you and your vehicle are given the best care.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.
Marketing and PR Manager

name: Chynna Ernest
text: Great experience with David Baker’s assistance. Very accommodating. Ryan in finance was very helpful as well. Great experience with everyone at Land Rover Gulf Coast!

name: Knox McMurphy
text: My experience with Gulf Coast Range Rover and David Baker and his team was amazing.  They were so patient  and understanding.  I love my new car.  I recommend anyone thinking of wanting a new car to contact David Baker and his team.

name: Roxanne Navarro
text: I purhased my first car here at Land Rover. Laura Barnes and Mr. David were great! They helped me decide and made this first purchase without any problem. On top of that, the vehicle was super nice!! They detailed it well. Recommended. So happy I got my first car with them. :)

name: susan Cravey
text: Great experience.  This dealership goes above and beyond to satisfy their customers. Special thank you to Ben Payne for helping me.

name: Troy Lee
text:
By far, the most enjoyable experience I've had purchasing a car.  They worked with me overseas, were willing to eat some costs not associated with them, and even paid the extra rental day when another shop didn't complete the work on time.

Ask for David Baker!

name: Mr Donald Hill. Sr.
text: I will go back live in Metairie La local Range Rover folks here have a hard time finding there way home at night. Took RR to them 3,times total of 9 days in shop and could not fix. These folks 1 trip 4 hour wait but fixed right the first time. It was a 300 Mile round trip but worth it.Place is clean Nice and they all treated me like family.It is all good there.

name: Josh Fandrich
text: Outstanding service. David Menaker delivered on his promises. Great place and great service.

name: Pamela McLemore
text: Top notch crew!  Excellent service and very efficient.  They go above and beyond to please!

name: Ross Bratlee
text: The team at Land Rover Gulf Coast was professional, knowledgable and courteous throughout the process, from initial lot-walking to new car delivery.  David Baker stayed in communication with us to address all questions and provided candid and insightful viewpoints on various models and features that fit our needs and interests. Yes, I'd buy from this team again!

name: James Taylor
text: I purchased a car all the way from Florida and this dealership, and Laura in particular, was incredibly efficient and fair to work with. She was very responsive and honest with me through out the entire negotiating/purchasing process. Highly recommend!

name: Mary Beth Taylor
text: Ben Payne and the crew at Land Rover Gulf Coast provided excellent service during the purchase of my new F Pace Jaguar.   I highly recommend this dealership.

name: Paul & Pam Ezell
text: We had a great experience at Land Rover Gulf Coast.  Micayla Stone went above and beyond to make sure all of our questions were answered, ensured a very pleasant transaction and her follow up has been great.  After a very bad dealer experience a year ago, Micayla and the staff at Land Rover Gulf Coast made sure we were extremely satisfied with our purchase.  Highly recommend them for a flawless start to finish car buying experience.

name: Tracy Gilley
text: Easiest vehicle purchase I have made in my life. Zero pressure and everyone was exceptionally courteous and friendly ! I highly recommend anyone to give them a try!

name: Art Lowery
text:
Superb experience; Ms. Davenport professionally and flawlessly lead us through the entire process, Jaguar and Joe Bullard Team should be extremely proud of the all around professionalism!
Art

name: Adon C.
text: Very professional and caring dealership. Ben was outstanding on making sure everything ran effectively and questions or concerns I had was answered with no pressure. The finance manager Ryan was also helpful and making the deal smooth and everything was in order. Thanks again!

resp.text:
Hi Adon!

Thanks for taking a minute to give us your feedback. We're very happy you had such a great experience with Ben and Ryan. We hope to see you again soon but in the meantime if you need anything just let us know!

Sincerely,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Allyson Thompson
text: Land Rover Gulf Coast is awesome! Chan was very personable... simply a joy to work with, and most importantly she did not pressure me to make a purchase. She answered all of my questions throughtout the entire process.

name: Joel Knight
text:
Indriana could not have been more pleasant or helpful.. she made the experience in Mobile very pleasant.
I had been dealing with another dealer, who actually couldn't spell or communicate.  I finally reached him by phone only to find he was busy and would call me back in 30 minutes. Guess what? He didn't call back. I reached out to Indriana in Mobile and wound up buying a vehicle. "Mr Busy" in Baton Rouge never called back, that was 5 days ago.

name: Lemongrass Custom Home & Design, Inc. Delia Pierce
text: Our vehicle purchase at Joe Bullard was THE BEST!  Ben Payne is an exceptional salesman, and our experience was excellent! He went above & beyond to make our buying experience a great one. We are so happy with the decision to purchase a vehicle from Joe Bullard. Their staff is courteous, friendly, & accommodating. They made the process quick without rushing us to make a decision. Their finance team was wonderful as well & they did a great job of walking us thru each step and made sure we made informed decisions regarding financing options, warranties, etc. We will definitely be back! We would absolutely recommend Joe Bullard Land Rover/Jaguar!!

name: C Thompson
text: Chan did an outstanding job in placing me with a new vehicle.  She is extremely professional and very knowledgeable.  I would definitely recommend her to others.

name: Kathy Sanchez
text:
This place is awesome!  The sales people are very personable and friendly!
Micayla listened to my wants and needs and presented me with so many options to test drive. We had so much fun and who would of thought you would have fun buying a car!
Brad the General Manager was so down to earth and a straight shooter and I liked that as they made me feel apart of the process and understand it. This is my second car from Joe Bullard and I will be back and recommend anyone needing a vehicle to go see the dynamic sales people like Micayla. You won’t be sorry!!!!!

name: Michelle Allen
text: David Baker is an excellent salesman ! Very easy to work with and very honest!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Sophie Schwaeble
text: Outstanding  professional service by David Baker and the entire Land Rover Gulf Coast staff. Purchased a Land Rover Velar that was delivered to us in Central Florida.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Vanessa Watson, MAOM, PMP
text: Awesome sales team! Thanks Levi and Brad.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Charles McGrath
text: I had no idea how bad this dealership is until I moved to Portland, OR and took my Land Rovers for service.  The price was about half of what I paid at the Mobile dealership, but even more important was that they actually fixed the chronic problems that had been previously addressed by the Mobile dealership. The lack of professionalism at the Mobile dealership was illustrated on one occasion when one of the mechanics taped over a bumper sticker that I guess he didn't agree with-incredible.

resp.text:
Hello Mr. McGrath,

I want to start by thanking you for your honest feedback about your experience with our service department. I have shared your comments with our General Manager to make sure these concerns are addressed. Good luck in your new location and if we can be of service in the future we’d love to try and earn back your business.

Sincerely,
Kristina M.
Marketing & PR Manager

name: Kimberley Hooper Riggs
text: Bought my Range Rover Evoque here in 2013. Great salesman and the service department has been awesome.

resp.text: Hi Kimberley, We're so thankful that you're still loving your vehicle and we're able to keep serving you all these years later.

name: H Williams
text: David Baker was amazing to work with! Everyone was so helpful, even after the purchase!

name: peyton Williams
text: Great customer service and willingness to work with their customers to get them in the vehicle they want.

name: Paul Stevens
text: Terrible service.  First visit they tried to sell unnecessary services.  Second visit they would not honor a manufacturers defect.  Told me to take to corporate JLR.  JLR told me decision rests with dealership.  Don't expect good service if you buy a vehicle from this dealership.

resp.text:
Hi Paul,

Thank you for this feedback and I would like to extend my sincerest apologies. I have notified the General Manager and the Service Manager of this review so please be expecting one of them to reach out to you to discuss in more detail.

Kindest regards,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Melissa Harkey
text: My salesman, Brad Lefferts went above and beyond in helping me choose the perfect Discovery to meet my family’s needs. I would highly recommend Jaguar Land Rover Gulf Coast.

name: Doug Walley
text: Amazing group of people. They bent over backwards to make every accommodation.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Mari Berney
text:
Thank you David Menake so much for all your effort and all you did to make it happen so I can get my car  finance  I appreciate all you did and Ryan too
If anyone needs a vehicle you need to come here and come see David

resp.text: Hi Mari, We're so glad to hear that David Menaker and Ryan Smith were able to make this a great experience for your purchase and finance needs. We strive to provide the best possible experience for our guests! Thank you for this feedback and rating. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Shirley Jones
text: It was a pleasure to work with David in the purchase of my new car.  David has experience and great knowledge of the car I purchased.

name: Pete Christofferson
text: Very professional organization.  Level of service matches the quality of vehicles.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Paul Beverly
text:
My daughter’s RR Sport engine stopped on Interstate 10 twenty miles west of Mobile. I called Land Rover Gulf Coast and spoke with Matthew Crandall and he was super helpful offering to go and get her. AAA towed her in and the service department got her car refueled and back on her way in minutes.
Big thanks to Matthew and David Menaker.
They went above and beyond to help! Highly recommend them.

name: Norma Newman
text: Wonderful experience with Brad Lefferts, he was very patient and came thru for me I so appreciate that ! Indriani Davenport was so professional showing every car I wanted to look at showing me different figures and comparing cars - again these people are very patient - then I asked to look at a certain car and that was it - feel in love with it - Brad help me with the financing and I believe he did his best ! And of course Ben Payne helped me with different futures in that car - he was wonder!!!! These people are so professional and totally recommend coming me to this dealership, this is my second vehicle from them.

name: Rosemary Nelson
text: Lauren was a very very good sales person she was so helpful I enjoyed her thanks Miss Nelson

name: William Bill-E Stitt (BILL E)
text: Outstanding in all that they do. Love the vehicles and appreciate the way they take care of customers from the sales team to the service team.  Above and beyond service.  Pretty darn good coffee maker in the lobby as well.

name: Kevin Olsen
text: Was handled by an associate by the name of  David Baker he was perfect throughout the whole process also his finance manager was great! Go Sox!

name: John Sims
text: Chan Nickerson is absolutely the most attentive and friendly auto salesman we have ever dealt with. No pressure sales, the entire experience could not have been better. We will differently buy again from Chan and Land Rover Jaquar Gulf Coast.

name: James Hartman
text: Great overall experience.  Ask for David, he makes it easy!

name: Larry saltee
text: Ben Payne has yet again set the standard for car salesmen everywhere.  We love our new Range Rover and I couldn't imagine buying from anyone else.

name: Joel Rudman
text: David Baker makes buying a car easy. Great service with no pressure.

name: Justin Gerlach
text: Had a great experience working with Laura and the rest of the crew at Joe Bullard.  Very hands on and walked us through every step of the process to make the sale happen as quickly and easily as possible.

resp.text: Thank you Justin for all the great feedback. We’re so glad your enjoyed your experience with us and we’re happy to have you as a part of our Joe Bullard and Land Rover family!

name: Joe Aguirre
text: This was my 2nd purchase from Joe Bullard and my sales assistant was Laura Barnes who is exceptional and made the transaction feel effortless for me. Thanks for having such a phenomenal staff at your dealership!!!

name: pam wood
text: I would luuuuuuuuuuv to own a Rover BUT I cannot afford😭

name: meyber santos
text: Love the customer service here always!!! Been coming for a year and they always treated me amazing 😉

name: Bridgett Miller
text: We drive 3 hours to a 1:00 scheduled oil change because it is the closest Land Rover dealer. We waited until 4:00 and were presented with a dirty car that wasn’t washed and vacuumed as it states on the receipt. When we asked he said he figured we didn’t want it because we waited so long..... really after 3+ hours what’s an extra 15 mins.... oh wait they close at 4 on Saturday’s. The service is below par at this dealership. If you’re gonna buy one go to Birmingham or just buy another brand.... the Volvo guys next door are much nicer! #readytotrade Customer service makes or brakes a brand and for us this dealership is terrible.

name: Theresa
text:
The BEST DEALERSHIP and STAFF, and over all the best most pleasant experience I have ever had!!
Hats off to this fine Dealership!!!

name: dawn michelet
text:
What an experience. I dropped my Land Rover Tuesday before 4 th of July  to be ready for fri.  I called everyday.  They didn't even call me back to Friday afternoon to be informed if wouldn't be ready till after the 4 th.    A 6 yr old car that never towed anything it's entire life needs a new  transmission    12,000.00     This is a  sub standard product     I have my car picked up and  delivered to my house which I receive a receipt for $207.23   I was quoted 165.  And states on my receipt that is was wash and vacuum.  Which it was not.    I will never return to this dealership nor will I ever purchase a Land Rover product.     Buyer beware.   If I could
Give them a negative rating I would.

resp.text:
Mrs. Michelet,

I'm very sorry that your experience was unpleasant. I do believe our GM, Marc Heiter, spoke with you after your visit to see how we could improve. I hope that if you ever have the need, you'll allow us the opportunity to earn back your business.

Sincerely,
Kristina M.
Marketing Manager

name: Lori Kaiser
text: David was very knowledgeable and helpful. I enjoyed doing business with them.

name: Todd Brice
text: Bought my son a new land rover. Great experience

name: Tamika Turner
text: Always OUTSTANDING SERVICE! #happycustomer #JAGUAR #QUALITYSERVICE

name: Christine Adkins
text: Not easy to get to if from out of town and using phone GPS, which us inaccurate. Once here every one is pleasant and helpful.

name: Five Channels
text:
We can't say enough about the customer service and team members at Joe Bullard's Jaguar / Land Rover Dealership. See you guys in another 3 years.

Looking for a new Jaguar? Ask for David Baker!

name: sharon dulaney
text: THE BEST WE LOVE  MR.BEN   PAYNE

name: Wes Jenson
text: Dealership staff was great to work with.

name: Thomas Mechas
text:
great experience,
no feeling of being pressured

name: Becca Vanderford
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Painman 58
text: Great service, as always!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!
